title: S17 Ep128: American Murderer w/ Matthew Gentile
itunes:title: American Murderer w/ Matthew Gentile
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents American Murderer with Screenwriter/Filmmaker/Director Matthew Gentile!

On November 29, 2004, Jason Derek Brown went from a life of running scams and being the ultimate con man, to pulling a heist of an armored vehicle.  It was that heist that would land Jason on the FBI's Top 10 Most Wanted list from 2004 until September of this year!

Matthew Gentile, the filmmaker behind the new movie, American Murderer, based on the true story of Jason Derek Brown, joins True Crime Tuesday to talk about the movie, about Jason's background and story, and where he think Jason ended up after the Armored Vehicle heist!

American Murderer is Only In Theatres October 21, 2022 and On Demand and On Digital October 28, 2022!
 
Check out more about the Filmmaker of American Murderer  , here:  https://www.matthewgentiledirector.com/

Check out the Cast and trailer for American Murderer here:  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13603778/

PLUS: an ALL-NEW Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals with Beer City Bruiser!!
